name: Hernays the Trusted: Paperthin
description:
Live your dreams of seeing a paper airplane live its life to the fullest! Navigate to the gusts of wind to keep your boi afloat!

Credits: -

UP 2014735 Jordan - Forest music; enemy AI programming (finished but unused).

UP 2017325 Fabio - Movement, Camera, Pause, Physics and UI tracking Programming, wind particular.

UP 2023255 Luke - Emotional Support, Level Builder, Lead.

UP 2027934 Mantas - Designer (game concept was his), Modelled trees, flowers and mushrooms for the biomes.

UP 960678 James - Lead, Modelled the forest biome and drew the concept art for both biomes and a secret unused one.

UP 2015264 Lewis - Transition, Collision detection Programming, Level building.

up2012893 Samuel - Cave assets, cave theme, cover photo.
